document.full_text: as villanova's losing streak grew to five with its loss in the big east tournament, the questions surrounding the wildcats, and their worthiness of an n.c.a.a. tournament bid, will only grow louder.
document.title: south florida 70, villanova 69: villanova's late slide continues in early exit
lines_and_colors: as villanova's losing streak grew to five with its loss in the big east tournament, the questions surrounding the wildcats, and their worthiness of an n.c.a.a. tournament bid, will only grow louder.
